Highlights.name: Social Equity Through Affirmative Action:
Highlights.description: The Pride Circle positions itself as a champion of social equity for the LGBTQ+ community in India. They likely advocate for policies and practices that create a more inclusive and fair environment.

Highlights.name: Range of Services
Highlights.description: The Pride Circle offers a variety of services, including leadership development, training programs, sensitization workshops, consultations, and industry roundtables. This comprehensive approach caters to different needs within organizations aiming to foster LGBTQ+ inclusion.

Highlights.name: Building Safe and Welcoming Workplaces
Highlights.description: Their services are geared towards creating safe and welcoming work environments for LGBTQ+ employees, potentially leading to increased engagement and productivity.

enhanced_description: Pride Circle is India's premier Diversity & Inclusion (D&I) Advisory Consultancy, dedicated to achieving social equity through affirmative action for the LGBTQ+ community in India. They partner with over 350 companies across the country, offering a comprehensive suite of services including Executive Leadership Development, D&I Training, Sensitization workshops, Consultation, Industry Roundtables, Research & Publications, Job Placements, and professional networking opportunities. Their mission is to build safe, inclusive, and welcoming work environments that foster LGBTQ+ inclusion, ultimately leading to increased employee engagement and productivity.
